address: Xã Bình Trị, Huyện Kiên Lương, Tỉnh Kiên Giang
thought:
**Analyzing Administrative Changes in Kiên Giang**

Okay, so I'm tasked with figuring out the new administrative unit for "Xã Bình Trị, Huyện Kiên Lương, Tỉnh Kiên Giang." My first move is to understand the bigger picture: what happened to Kiên Giang Province.

I immediately check for province-level changes, specifically if Kiên Giang was merged.  Bingo! Resolution 60-NQ/TW states that Kiên Giang merged with An Giang to form An Giang Province. Now I know I'm looking within the new province of "Tỉnh An Giang."

Next, I need to pinpoint "Xã Bình Trị" and its former district, "Huyện Kiên Lương," in the relevant resolutions.  Even though the prompt mentioned that all districts are being eliminated, using the district name helps me focus my search within the available resolutions.

My search turned up several resolutions, but only one jumped out as a likely match: Resolution 1654/NQ-UBTVQH15 (An Giang). This resolution explicitly mentions "Xã Bình Trị" and "Huyện Kiên Lương."  Perfect!  This is promising because it aligns with my previous finding that Kiên Giang is now part of An Giang.

Looking closer, the resolution states that "Xã Bình Trị" and other areas are being combined to form a new ward called "Xã Kiên Lương." The resolution is also for An Giang, which is the merged province.

The other resolutions were tempting but didn't quite fit.  1659/NQ-UBTVQH15 mentioned a "Bình Trị," but that was in Đà Nẵng, which is not the same place. Similarly, the ones in Quảng Ngãi (1677/NQ-UBTVQH15) and Tây Ninh (1682/NQ-UBTVQH15) are irrelevant. I can dismiss 1685/NQ-UBTVQH15 quickly because it pertains to Ho Chi Minh City, not Kiên Giang.

So, based on this analysis, I'm confident that the new administrative unit for "Xã Bình Trị, Huyện Kiên Lương, Tỉnh Kiên Giang" is **Xã Kiên Lương** in the new province of An Giang.

citation.header: 1654/NQ-UBTVQH15: Sắp xếp các đơn vị hành chính cấp xã của tỉnh An Giang
citation.line: 77. Sắp xếp toàn bộ diện tích tự nhiên, quy mô dân số của thị trấn Kiên Lương, xã Bình An (huyện Kiên Lương) và xã Bình Trị thành xã mới có tên gọi là xã Kiên Lương.
